snippet.title: Mirror Forge - Silent Hill Inspired Horror Game (Official Trailer 2022)
snippet.description:
Try the FREE Demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1807200/Mirror_Forge/
Don't forget to ring the "Add to Wishlist" Button!

Horror Player or Silent Hill Lover?

Don't forget to Add it to your Wishlist!

Join the upcoming Psychological Survival Horror game inspired by Silent Hill & Stranger Things. Roam between alternate realities scourged by fear, madness & machinery. Solve puzzles, explore mysteries in an immersive storyline where your choices matter as you look for the love of your life.

For Fans of Psychological / Survival Horror, Alternate Dimensions,
Fear of the Unknown, and lovers of immersive narratives.

***

MystiveDev was founded by Bobby – a Full-Time Solo Indie Game Developer, 3D Artist for 8 years and Digital Marketer. Bobby’s work includes various hyper-casual, RTS and FPS games for clients, as well as his own games including a psychological survival horror game he worked on while he was the Lead Artist of Mystive Studios.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MystiveDev
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mystivedev/
Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mystivedev
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/MystiveDev
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MystiveDev
